remarks: Lemma for ~ dchrvmasum .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrisum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrvmasum.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ m e. RR+ ) -> F e. CC ) $.
dchrvmasum.g $e |- ( m = ( x / d ) -> F = K ) $.
dchrvmasum.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
dchrvmasum.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. CC ) $.
dchrvmasum.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ m e. ( 3 [,) +oo ) ) -> ( abs ` ( F - T ) ) <_ ( C x. ( ( log ` m ) / m ) ) ) $.
dchrvmasum.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. RR ) $.
dchrvmasum.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. m e. ( 1 [,) 3 ) ( abs ` ( F - T ) ) <_ R ) $.
dchrvmasumlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR+ |-> sum_ d e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( ( abs ` ( K - T ) ) / d ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d .1. m x $.
$d C d m x $.
$d D m x $.
$d F d x $.
$d K m $.
$d L d m x $.
$d N m x $.
$d R d m x $.
$d T d m x $.
$d X d m x $.
$d Z m x $.
$d d m ph x $.
